title: Environmental Education Program for Understanding Ecosystems and Practicing Biodiversity

context.prior_knowledge: Basic ecology knowledge and awareness of environmental issues
context.additional_context: Strengthening data analysis and problem-solving competencies through integration with mathematical domains

learning_goals: Learners can derive three core concepts explaining ecosystem components and the importance of biodiversity.
Learners can write reports applying mathematical modeling (e.g., calculating population decline rates) for environmental case analysis.
Learners can propose at least two improvements to educational methods based on survey results.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
